evidence.text: IVAN: Ivan. Sit down, sit down. You're a beautiful girl.

ANI: Ok. So what are you looking for?
IVAN: Sex.
ANI: Yeah, I know. I mean... anything special?
IVAN: Yeah, special sex.
ANI: Special sex. So... a little bit of everything.
IVAN: That sounds special. Yeah.
ANI: Want to take your clothes off?

IVAN: So... I want you to be exclusive with me. For the week. And we can have... fun.
IVAN: Hang with me and my boys for the week. We can have fun. Party. Like... be my girlfriend for the week.
IVAN: My horny girlfriend for the week.

IVAN: It is Vegas. Don't people get married in Vegas?
ANI: Don't fuck around.
IVAN: I'm not fucking around.
ANI: Ok, well then go get married.
IVAN: Ok. Let's get married.
ANI: Don't tease me with that shit. That ain't cool.
IVAN: Will you marry me?
ANI: Seriously?
ANI: You want to marry... you want to get married?

ANI: I mean... This is good news. Right? Parents usually want their kids to get married.
IVAN: Yeah, but my parents are dicks. And whatever.
ANI: Well, no matter what. I hope they like me... You know... Like, when we meet.
IVAN: When will I meet your family?
IVAN: Time to say goodbye. My wife and I would like some privacy, thank you. And tell Toros to go fuck himself.

ANI: So we're just going to get divorced!?!
IVAN: Yes! Of course! What are you stupid?
ANI: I'm glad to be divorcing your sorry ass. You're pathetic, man.
